title: Knowledge-Sharing Culture Design to Strengthen Organizational Learning Capabilities

context.additional_context: Developing capabilities to design learning systems through fostering knowledge-sharing cultures within organizations for science field professionals

learning_goals: Learners can develop organizational learning strategies by analyzing knowledge-sharing culture components (trust, behavior, systems)
